# init(isIncluded:marketingContent:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ StoreKit ](/documentation/storekit)

- [ SubscriptionOptionGroup ](/documentation/storekit/subscriptionoptiongroup)

- [ init(isIncluded:marketingContent:) ](/documentation/storekit/subscriptionoptiongroup/init(isincluded:marketingcontent:))

-  init(isIncluded:marketingContent:) 

Initializer# init(isIncluded:marketingContent:)

StoreKitSwiftUIiOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
init(
    isIncluded: @escaping (Product) -> Bool,
    @ViewBuilder marketingContent: () -> MarketingContent
) where Content == Never
```

Available when `Content` conforms to `StoreContent`, `Label` is `AutomaticSubscriptionOptionGroupLabel`, and `MarketingContent` conforms to `View`.## [See Also](/documentation/storekit/subscriptionoptiongroup/init(isincluded:marketingcontent:)#see-also)
